channel.title: AI on dubell.io
channel.description: Recent content in AI on dubell.io

item.title: Learn AI or Get Left Behind
item.description: The AI boom has not gone unnoticed, ChatGPT captured everyone’s attention with its science fiction like behavior, and the generative image AIs have gone super nova, disrupting everything we knew about art. We have not yet figured out what all this means for the future. One thing is clear though, if you want to be apart of the future, you’re going to need to learn AI. Large language models (LLMs) have already taken people by storm and changed how people work.
